title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. Instead, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When I click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the section with the Combo labeled 'Host:'.
3. Click on the Combo to try and give it focus.
